definition: foolish, a pitch with reverse spin that curves toward the side of the plate from which it was thrown
details:
adjective
- foolish
= synonyms: half-baked
noun
- a pitch with reverse spin that curves toward the side of the plate from which it was thrown
- a whimsically eccentric person
= synonyms: crank, nut, fruitcake, crackpot, nut case
